website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful holiday advent calendar from last year that the entire family can enjoy.
pros: This set includes plenty of interactive mini figures that will have you excited for each new day
Each piece works together nicely to create a beautiful holiday scene that everyone can admire
Assembly is simple and fun for kids and grownups alike
cons: Sits at a slightly higher price point than other LEGO calendars, due to it's collectible nature

customer_reviews.title: Really fun set for leading up to the holidays
customer_reviews.text: This was a really fun set for my 6 year old son. He looked forward every day to opening a new slot and adding to the scene. The figures were very easy to assemble and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rubinstein

customer_reviews.title: A huge Hit with my Lego Obsessed Son!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been a huge Lego fan for years. He loved opening a Lego surprise each day leading to Christmas. There were a lot of action figures, which he thought was great. There was only one "child figure". He wished there were more (as apparently they are rare). Overall though, this was great fun and by the end he had a great collection of Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Two

customer_reviews.title: Advent
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely wonderful idea for kids to count down to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie L. Coughran

customer_reviews.title: Brought Advent Joy
customer_reviews.text: As a realistic adult, I will say ALL Legos are overpriced. BUT.. my child enjoyed this so much and every morning during Advent he woke excitedly, wanting to open the next window, so for his level of appreciation I give it 5 stars. (I would give it a 2 for price!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old puts the pieces together himself. Pieces are small but ok for older children. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Reading mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is looking forward to December 1st, so he can start this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Its a callander. Son looks forward to it each year
customer_reviews.author: name pen

customer_reviews.title: Aforable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Kids really enjoyed this advent calendar. Everyday had a new little lego kit to assemble. They looked forward to it every evening
customer_reviews.author: Ladypila

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar was great! My 4 yo son loved it! Each day had a different holiday themed Lego figure with instructions on assembly! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Reumund

customer_reviews.title: Sweet lego
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. The characters and build items rocked. Gingerbread house, Santa, snow blower....
customer_reviews.author: Travis M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that every year is different! I also think that this year was better than 2016's assortment.
customer_reviews.author: Lasabar

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Lego City, got a mis-barcoded Lego Friends set ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Lego City, got a mis-barcoded Lego Friends set! Luckily my BOY didn't care, "It's Legos, dad."
customer_reviews.author: Baka

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: For $45 I expect this to arrive in pristine condition. It arrived ripped open, with a general "used" feeling about it. Exceptionally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. My son loves it. It was super fun to see what was next.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun countdown
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for Grandson. He loves leggos and making something new each day as countdown to Christmas wad perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Husband and Nephew seriously enjoyed and loved this!! Fun for all ages. Cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Advent calendar my 9 year old has ever done!!! Each day was adorable!
customer_reviews.author: What kind of name?

customer_reviews.title: Our son loved it and looked forward to opening his prize each ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son loved it and looked forward to opening his prize each day. Some of the pieces were a little small for him to work with on his own (5yo), but we did it together.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: She believes boys have the best Legos
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with these Legos, yes I said daughter lol. She believes boys have the best Legos haha
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh Earth

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I enjoyed opening each day and building. She had fun playing with the toys every day.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: A must have Christmas item for boys. My son loves this and starts requesting it in October!
customer_reviews.author: R. Krokowski

customer_reviews.title: The Lego Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great preholiday gift for our 3 yr old granddaughter, since her parents frown on candy.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set. Comes with a lot of figures and really kept my kids busy. They enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think my daughter would have liked the one her sister got.
customer_reviews.author: ajacks

customer_reviews.title: By far the best advent calendar out there
customer_reviews.text: By far the best advent calendar out there. My son loves building something small everyday. This is the 3rd year I have bought the different versions and will probably again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Stavrakas

customer_reviews.title: Holiday traditions!
customer_reviews.text: Every year this advent calendar does not disappoint. Children are now 13 &14, still enjoy and participate in the event with anticipation.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: The kids (and grown ups) had a great time with this
customer_reviews.text: The kids (and grown ups) had a great time with this !!! Can’t wait to do it again next year!
customer_reviews.author: StacieB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for all my grandkids every Christmas!! You can’t ever go wrong with Legos!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Son Loved It!!! So much fun counting down the days until Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M. Ganci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: grandkids LOVED this and still working on it each day until Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Novak

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, this came in a secure package and arrived within expected delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Kene M. Jones

product_meta.title: Lego City - Advent Calendar 2017
product_meta.description: Add to your current sets or start new ones with the different surprises waiting in the LEGO City Advent Calendar. Open a numbered door each day and find out whats waiting behind it for you. Will it be a vehicle or maybe even a brand new minifigure? Perhaps even Santa? The only way to find out is to open the doors, a day at a time.
feature_bullets: Includes six minifigures: Snowboarder kid, grandma, two coast guard members, jungle explorer and Santa
Features 24 different items including buildings, vehicles, seasonal items and minifigures
Open each door to reveal the surprise for the day
Collect all the minifigures to add to your collections or sets
Celebrate the holiday spirit in LEGO city with this fun advent calendar

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars495 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
